item.title: Transformations in Spark
item.description: Transformations in Spark aggregate The aggregate can return a different type than RDD on which we are working on. It allows users to apply 2 functions, one on top of each partition (input type T => U), other to aggregate the results of all the partitions into final result (merging 2 U’s). Both the functions have to be commutative and associative. We can also specify a initial value. val inputRdd = sc.
